sandassethi - ‘san’ yana ekathu kirima, ras kirima ha upadanaya kirima pilibanda pahadili kirima samadapethi - ekathu karagath ‘san’ walin midi nidahas wi samma thathwayata pathwana kriyamargaya pahadili kirima samuththejethi - ekathu kirime kriyawata mul wu patichcha wima sahamulin udura dama ‘san’ mula galawa damuwa yana kriyawaliya wisthara kirima sampahansethi - ‘san’ prahanaya kara ‘san’ walin sadahata ma midi nidahas wannata maga penwa di niwan suwayata niwaradi maga penwa dunna yana theruma mewa sawadya artha dakwim bawa palibhashawa ha dharmaya danno danithi.
